description: Updates collaboration metadata and can only be called by the collaboration owner.

nested_items.name: collaboration
nested_items.description: The entire collaboration that has been updated.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the collaboration.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the collaboration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A human-readable identifier provided by the collaboration owner. Display names are not unique.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the collaboration provided by the collaboration owner.

nested_items.name: creatorAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier used to reference members of the collaboration. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: creatorDisplayName
nested_items.description: A display name of the collaboration creator.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the collaboration was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the collaboration metadata was last updated.

nested_items.name: memberStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a member in a collaboration.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for your membership within the collaboration.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for your membership within the collaboration.

nested_items.name: dataEncryptionMetadata
nested_items.description: The settings for client-side encryption for cryptographic computing.

nested_items.name: allowCleartext
nested_items.description: Indicates whether encrypted tables can contain cleartext data ( TRUE) or are to cryptographically process every column ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: allowDuplicates
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Fingerprint columns can contain duplicate entries ( TRUE) or are to contain only non-repeated values ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: allowJoinsOnColumnsWithDifferentNames
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Fingerprint columns can be joined on any other Fingerprint column with a different name ( TRUE) or can only be joined on Fingerprint columns of the same name ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: preserveNulls
nested_items.description: Indicates whether NULL values are to be copied as NULL to encrypted tables ( TRUE) or cryptographically processed ( FALSE).

nested_items.name: queryLogStatus
nested_items.description: An indicator as to whether query logging has been enabled or disabled for the collaboration.

nested_items.name: jobLogStatus
nested_items.description: An indicator as to whether job logging has been enabled or disabled for the collaboration.

nested_items.name: analyticsEngine
nested_items.description: The analytics engine for the collaboration.
